title: realityOS rumors? Why Iâ€™m still waiting for homeOS to become a reality
content:
With Apple’s reported Mixed Reality headset likely to be unveiled in 2022 or 2023, more references to realityOS were found within the company’s code. Though there’s another operating system that’s been rumored for over a year now that I still wish Apple would actually announce: homeOS.

more…

The post realityOS rumors? Why I’m still waiting for homeOS to become a reality appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: With realityOS around the corner, there's another operating system that I still hope Apple will eventually unveil: homeOS.
